articles.author: Mark Thompson, CNN Business
articles.title: Barclays CEO quits after investigation into links with Jeffrey Epstein - CNN
articles.description: The American chief executive of Barclays, Jes Staley, is stepping down with immediate effect following an investigation by British regulators into his relationship with disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein, the bank said on Monday.

articles.title: American Airlines cancels nearly 850 flights on Sunday - News24
articles.description: American Airlines canceled nearly 850 domestic and international flights on Sunday, citing staffing shortages and unfavorable weather, pushing total cancellations to 1 739 and counting since Friday.
